summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5534 for the improvement of 46th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to the north line of Thornberg's 2nd Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70998, as amended by Ordinances Nos. 72023 and 72097, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
